attributes.action: Rescind Sky TVs licence to broadcast in UK
attributes.additional_details:
Sky TV do not pass the "fit and proper" qualification to hold a licence to broadcast, and as such, Ofcom should rescind their licence to broadcast in the UK.
Rupert Murdoch and his representatives have behaved appallingly, and consistently misrepresented their actions, telling different stories to different audiences to try to maintain their shabby business. Leveson was inconclusive, and too many politicians appear to be in his pocket. It's time to say enough is enough, and close him down in the UK.
